name: WC Add Payment Type to Admin Email
author: Gagan Tiwari

sections.description: WC Add Payment Type to Admin Email plugin adds a functionality to Woocommerce plugin that displays payment method used by customer in admin e-mail. This plugin requires Woocommerce.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload hide-related-products.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. You are done.
sections.faq: No Need to configure any setting or code to get it working. Its automatically will add payment type in admin email of woocommerce.

short_description: Add Payment Type to Admin Email in WooCommerce In next Version Multiple Language Supported.
description: WC Add Payment Type to Admin Email plugin adds a functionality to Woocommerce plugin that displays payment method used by customer in admin e-mail. This plugin requires Woocommerce.

tags.add-payment-type-to-admin-email: add payment type to admin email
